name: tailwind-demo
description: Demo of how Tailwind works used for my talk at the Port Macquarie Wordpress Meetup

scripts.build: npx tailwind build tailwind.css -c tailwind.config.js -o styles.css
scripts.start: npm run init && npm run build && npm run purgecss
scripts.win-start: npx tailwind init && npm run build && npm run purgecss
